channel.title: Travels on Klara Łuczka-Hanzalová
channel.description: Recent content in Travels on Klara Łuczka-Hanzalová

item.title: Lyrical Croatian Adventures
item.description: It began simply as a family visit, to a country I saw as overrated among tourists – growing up in Poland I never stopped hearing about people’s holidays in Croatia. At the time the destination seemed quite attractive, but with the years my interest faded away, until a new motivation appeared – to walk the roads along which many of my husband’s childhood summers were scattered. So we waved goodbye to Scotland to discover a new destination.
